Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : Of 292 subjects , 47 . 9 % of the subjects had a past history of psychotic symptoms and 13 . 0 % of the patients were having current psychotic symptoms .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| psychotic symptoms |
| psychotic symptoms |

The two entities in the paragraph that refer to diseases are "psychotic symptoms" and "psychotic symptoms" (the latter refers to current symptoms).

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Disease |
| --- |
| psychotic symptoms |

The entity "psychotic symptoms" clearly refers to a disease or a medical condition, whereas "patients" and "subjects" are not diseases.
